com.pushtechnology.diffusion.transform.messaging.receive

Interface TransformedRequestStream<T,U,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of request understood by Diffusion
    U - the type of request
    V - the type of response
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.pushtechnology.diffusion.client.callbacks.Callback, com.pushtechnology.diffusion.client.callbacks.Stream

    public interface TransformedRequestStream<T,U,V>
extends com.pushtechnology.diffusion.client.callbacks.Stream
    A transformed request stream.

      • onRequest

        void onRequest(String path,
               U request,
               TransformedRequestStream.Responder<V> responder)
        Notifies the stream of a transformed request.
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        request - the request that could not be transformed
        responder - a responder for the request

      • onTransformationException

        void onTransformationException(String path,
                               T request,
                               TransformedRequestStream.Responder<V> responder,
                               TransformationException e)
        Notifies the failure to transform a value.
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        request - the request that could not be transformed
        responder - a responder for the request
        e - the exception thrown when attempting to transform the value
